title: ON HIS 89TH BIRTHDAY KARUNANIDHI VOWS FOR TAMIL EELAM IN SRI LANKA
content: Onlanka News – By Walter Jayawardhana Chairman of the Tamil Eelam Supporters Association (TESO) and President of the DMK addressing a meeting held in Chennai to celebrate his 89th birthday vowed to create a separate state for Tamils in Sri Lanka….
